subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for José Canseco said Saturday that Jeff Novitzky called him last week to set up a meeting with Canseco when he is in the Bay Area this week to promote his new book.
snippet: A lawyer for José Canseco said Saturday that Jeff Novitzky called him last week to set up a meeting with Canseco when he is in the Bay Area this week to promote his new book.
